text: Va [sumo mardon] harcand ʙikused, hargiz nametavoned [az nazari muhaʙʙati qalʙi] mijoni zanon adolat ʙarqaror kuned, pas, jaksara [ʙa jake majl nakuned va] az jake ru nagardoned, ki uro ʙilotaklif raho kuned. Va agar sozis namoed va parhezgori kuned, ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo omurzandai mehruʙon ast
